kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_setup (M1003C0)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection setups.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_by_cn (M1003C1)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection releases from the CN.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_req_rnl (M1003C2)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection release requests due to a Radio Network Layer cause.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_req_trl (M1003C3)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection release requests due to a Transport Layer cause.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_req_nas (M1003C4)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection release requests due to a Non-access Stratum cause.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_req_prot (M1003C5)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection release requests due to a Protocol cause.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_req_misc (M1003C6)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection release requests due to a Miscellaneous cause.

kpi_info.title: sign_conn_rel_req_non_st (M1003C7)
kpi_info.use: A number of signalling connection release requests due to a Non-standard cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_req_by_cn (M1003C8)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests by the CN. NOTE! A RAB assignment message can include more than one RAB assignment request.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_req_by_cn (M1003C9)
kpi_info.use: The number of RABs requested to reconfigure by the CN. Note that a RAB assignment request can include more than one RAB reconfiguration request and this counter is updated by the number of RABs. UPDATED:When the RANAP signalling entity receives RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST with RAB reconfiguration information from the CN.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_by_cn (M1003C10)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests sent by the CN. NOTE! A RAB assignment message can include more than one RAB release request.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_succ (M1003C11)
kpi_info.use: A number of RABs successfully established. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment response.

kpi_info.title: rab_reconf_succ (M1003C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of successfully reconfigured Radio Access Bearers. Note that a RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response and this counter is updated by the number of RABs. UPDATED:When the RANAP signalling entity sends RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE indicating a successful RAB reconfiguration.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_rnl (M1003C13)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests failed due to a Radio Network Layer cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment responses.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_trl (M1003C14)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests failed due to a Transport Layer cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment response.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_nas (M1003C15)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests failed due to a Non-access Stratum cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment response.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_prot (M1003C16)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests failed due to a Protocol cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment response.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_misc (M1003C17)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests failed due to a Miscellaneous cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment response.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_non_st (M1003C18)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests failed due to a Non-standard cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB assignment response.

kpi_info.title: rab_ass_nonsucc_anch (M1003C19)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB assignment requests that failed to fulfill due to an anchoring case.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_nonsucc_rnl (M1003C20)
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB reconfiguration requests failed due to a Radio Network Layer cause. The most common reason for this is that core network requests to change parameters in such way that the RNC does not support or RAB reconfiguration feature is disabled in the RNC. Note that a RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response and this counter is updated by the number of RABs. UPDATED:When the RANAP signalling entity sends RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE with failed RAB reconfiguration information to the CN.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_nonsucc_trl (M1003C21)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB reconfiguration requests failed due to a Transport Layer cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_nonsucc_nas (M1003C22)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB reconfiguration requests that failed due to a Non Access Stratum cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_nonsucc_prot (M1003C23)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB reconfiguration requests failed due to a Protocol cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_nonsucc_misc (M1003C24)
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB reconfiguration failures due to Miscellaneous category cause.This failure happens if the core network requests RAB reconfiguration but the feature is disabled in the RNC. Note that a RAB Assignment Response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response and this counter is updated by the number of RABs. UPDATED: When the RANAP signalling entity sends RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE with a Miscellaneous category cause to the CN.

kpi_info.title: rab_rec_nonsucc_non_st (M1003C25)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB reconfiguration requests failed due to a Non-standard cause. NOTE! A RAB assignment response message can include more than one RAB reconfiguration response.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_succ (M1003C26)
kpi_info.use: A number of RABs that have been successfully released.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_nonsucc (M1003C27)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests that failed to release.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_by_rnc (M1003C28)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release request sent to the CN.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_rnl (M1003C29)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests due to a Radio Network Layer cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_trl (M1003C30)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests due to a Transport Layer cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_nas (M1003C31)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests due to a Non-access Stratum cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_prot (M1003C32)
kpi_info.use: number of RAB release requests due to a Protocol cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_misc (M1003C33)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests due to a Miscellaneous cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_non_st (M1003C34)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB release requests due to a Non-standard cause.

kpi_info.title: rab_rel_req_by_rnc_anch (M1003C35)
kpi_info.use: A number of RAB releases requested by RNC due to anchoring RNC case. Multi-service case.

kpi_info.title: rec_pag_msg (M1003C36)
kpi_info.use: A number of paging messages received from the CN. NOTE! From the received paging message the RNC can generate a Paging type 1 message or Paging type 2 message.

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_rec_loc_rep_contr (M1003C37)
kpi_info.use: Number of received location reporting control messages from the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_sent_loc_rep (M1003C38)
kpi_info.use: Number of sent location report messages to the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_sent_over_cont (M1003C39)
kpi_info.use: Number of sent overload control messages to the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_rec_over_cont (M1003C40)
kpi_info.use: Number of received overload control messages from the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_sent_reset (M1003C41)
kpi_info.use: Number of sent Reset messages to the CN.

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_rec_reset (M1003C42)
kpi_info.use: Number of received Reset messages from the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_sent_reset_ack (M1003C43)
kpi_info.use: Number of sent reset acknowledgement messages to the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_rec_reset_ack (M1003C44)
kpi_info.use: Number of received reset acknowledgement messages from the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_sent_error_ind (M1003C45)
kpi_info.use: Number of sent error indication messages to the CN

kpi_info.title: nbr_of_rec_error_ind (M1003C46)
kpi_info.use: Number of received error indication messages from the CN

kpi_info.title: DEL_PAG_MSG_ICSU_OVERLOAD (M1003C47)
kpi_info.use: Number of deleted paging messages due to overload in ICSU. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: DEL_PAG_MSG_RRMU_OVERLOAD (M1003C48)
kpi_info.use: Number of deleted paging messages due to overload in RRMU. Note: This counter doesn't have a formula and the default (SUM) was used.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_REL_BY_CN_DUE_NCCR (M1003C49)
kpi_info.use: Succesful Iu connection releases due to blind Network Controlled Reselection (NCCR) to GPRS due to service reason. Updated: When the RNC receives RANAP:IU_RELEASE_COMMAND from the CN after successful blind Network Controlled Reselection.

kpi_info.title: CN_INVOKE_TRACE (M1003C50)
kpi_info.use: The number of received CN Invoke Trace messages. Updated: When RANAP:CN INVOKE TRACE message is received from CN.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_RELEASE_RESPONSE (M1003C51)
kpi_info.use: The number of signaling connection release responses (IU RELEASE COMPLETE) sent to CN. Updated: When the RNC sends RANAP:IU RELEASE COMPLETE message to CN as a response for RANAP:IU RELEASE COMMAND message.

kpi_info.title: IU_AVAILABILITY (M1003C52)
kpi_info.use: The number of samples when Iu interface is in working state. The Iu interface availability percentage can be calculated as a ratio of this counter and M1003C53. UPDATED:The counter is updated by value 1 once in approximately 10 seconds when the Iu interface SCCP subsystem is in working state.

kpi_info.title: IU_AVAILABILITY_DENOM (M1003C53)
kpi_info.use: The number of samples for Iu availability measuring, used as a denominator for Iu availability percentage calculation. UPDATED:The counter is updated by value 1 once in approximately 10 seconds when the Iu interface exists in any state.

kpi_info.title: IU_NOT_WORKING_DURATION (M1003C54)
kpi_info.use: The duration that Iu interface is in non-working state. UPDATED:Updated by the number of unavailability seconds when the Iu interface SCCP subsystem starts working after a break.

kpi_info.title: IU_TO_WO_STATE_CHANGES (M1003C55)
kpi_info.use: The number of Iu interface state changes from non-working to working state. UPDATED:When the Iu interface SCCP subsystem state is changed to working state. Counter update is done for each configured Iu-connection.

kpi_info.title: REC_LOC_REL_DATA_REQUEST (M1003C56)
kpi_info.use: The number of Location Related Data Request messages received from the CN. UPDATED:When a RANAP signalling entity receives a RANAP: LOCATION RELATED DATA REQUEST message from the CN.

kpi_info.title: SENT_LOC_REL_DATA_RESPONSE (M1003C57)
kpi_info.use: The number of Location Related Data Response messages sent to the CN. UPDATED:When a RANAP signalling entity sends a RANAP: LOCATION RELATED DATA RESPONSE message to the CN.

kpi_info.title: SENT_LOC_REL_DATA_FAIL (M1003C58)
kpi_info.use: The number of Location Related Data Failure messages sent to the CN. UPDATED:When a RANAP signalling entity sends a RANAP: LOCATION RELATED DATA FAILURE message to the CN.
